feed.title: Category: Searchme | Random thoughts | Hari KT

entry.title: Visual Search by Searchme
entry.content: By coolris we can use the preview of a website when we search in google. I have tried it and it was a wonderful tool. Recently I found another search engine which uses the same features. But its having something different. In coolris , when we point to the preview the page will be loaded in small box. May be in an iframe . But in searchme each page is loaded with the image of the site. We can move to the next by just moving the mouse to right . Its in beeta version . Looks pretty good . You can have a look into the site searchme.com
